member.name: T:Vintasoft.Imaging.Annotation.Pdf.AnnotationConverter
member.summary: Converter that converts the Vintasoft annotations to the PDF annotations.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Annotation.Pdf.AnnotationConverter.ConvertToPdfAnnotations(System.IO.Stream,Vintasoft.Imaging.Resolution,Vintasoft.Imaging.Pdf.Tree.PdfPage)
member.summary: Converts the serialized Vintasoft annotations to the PDF annotations.
member.param: The stream that contains serialized Vintasoft annotations.
The resolution of an image with annotations.
The parent PDF page of new annotations.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Annotation.Pdf.AnnotationConverter.ConvertToPdfAnnotations(Vintasoft.Imaging.Annotation.AnnotationDataCollection,Vintasoft.Imaging.Resolution,Vintasoft.Imaging.Pdf.Tree.PdfPage)
member.summary: Converts the Vintasoft annotations to the PDF annotations.
member.param: The collection that contains Vintasoft annotations.
The parent PDF page of new annotations.
The resolution of an image with annotations.
